metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18197 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in libgig 4.1.0. There is an operator new[] failure (due to a big pSampleLoops heap request) in DLS::Sampler::Sampler in DLS.cpp.

criterions.comment: libgig: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
